column4: Unit Size：φ200xH76mm；Actual Power：800W；Supply Voltage：220-240V~50/60Hz；Control：Knob control；Glass size：φ152.5mm，black color，artwork can be customized；Timer：No；Length of Power Cord：1.2mtr；Packaging accessories：User manual，PE bag，inner tray，gift box，carton；Net weight：1.2KG；Container information：1 pcs/gift box，12 pcs/carton
